tool_description: Estimates travel time for routes considering current traffic conditions, historical patterns, and predictive models.

route_waypoints.description: Sequence of coordinate pairs defining the route

departure_time.description: Planned departure time in ISO 8601 format

vehicle_type.description: Vehicle type: car, truck, motorcycle, bus

include_stops.description: Whether to include estimated stop times

error_messages: Invalid route: Need at least 2 waypoints to calculate travel time.
Missing traffic data: Current traffic information is required for accurate estimates.
Invalid departure time: Use ISO 8601 format or 'now' for current time.
Unsupported vehicle type: Use one of [car, truck, motorcycle, bus].
Route too complex: Maximum 100 waypoints allowed per estimation.
usage: Provide route_waypoints and current_traffic arrays. Optionally specify departure_time for future travel, vehicle_type for vehicle-specific estimates, and include_stops for comprehensive time calculation.

estimated_duration.description: Total estimated travel time in minutes

segment_times.description: Estimated time for each route segment in minutes

arrival_time.description: Estimated arrival time in ISO 8601 format
